channel.title: 13. License on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in 13. License on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: 13.1 License in flex
item.description: Introduction Ocamlyacc is a general-purpose parser generator that converts a grammar description for an LALR(1) context-free grammar into a Ocaml program to parse that grammar. Once you are proficient with Ocamlyacc, you may use it to develop a wide range of language parsers, from those used in simple desk calculators to complex programming languages. Ocamlyacc is very close to the well-known yacc (or bison) commands that can be found in most C programming environments.

item.title: 13.2 Copyright and permission
item.description: Introduction Ocamlyacc is a general-purpose parser generator that converts a grammar description for an LALR(1) context-free grammar into a Ocaml program to parse that grammar. Once you are proficient with Ocamlyacc, you may use it to develop a wide range of language parsers, from those used in simple desk calculators to complex programming languages. Ocamlyacc is very close to the well-known yacc (or bison) commands that can be found in most C programming environments.
